website_summaries.verdict: One of the best high-quality alternatives for a keychain breathalyzer with a more affordable price tag.
pros: Mouthpiece folds in and out for easy storage and use
Sensor filters out other airborne gases for better results
Comes in different colors and styles for personalization
cons: Breathalyzer body is easy to damage if left in a pocket with keys attached

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived defective. I was weary to buy this because of the return policy, but a friend had bought the same model and recommended it. Hers worked perfectly. Mine came and wouldn't even function for a single blow. I tried three different batteries and every time I try to turn it on and use it the screen comes on and beeps for a few seconds max before turning back off. The screen shows a battery icon that is almost empty even with fresh batteries. And now they won't take it back or refund. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Rogers

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good. Handy device to have.
customer_reviews.text: I received this handy little device today and I tried it out before I had even a sip of any alcohol. It read at .00. After having three drinks, I waited as directed (20 minutes), blew again, and it read a .08. (I'm female, 5'6 and weigh 140). I let my friend who hadn't drank any alcohol blow into it after I blew the second time, and it read accurately for him (at .00). So far, the product seems pretty accurate and I have no complaints whatsoever. It's awesome to have an estimate of where I'm at regarding my blood alcohol content for a great price. I'll be gifting this to my friends as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second time buying the exact model. The first one was AMAZING, had NO ISSUES. Unfortunately, it is very difficult to see what is the BAC reading. Depending on the angle, it says 0.10 or 0.00. I am very disappointed with this breathalyzer; the quality does not seem to be as good as it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Celata

customer_reviews.title: AUNTIE AWESOME Says... Be smart (and popular)  Get this, Gift this
customer_reviews.text: SURELY SAVED ME FROM POSSIBLE CATASTROPHY, MORE THAN ONCE. I have one for myself and I have another for anyone that I may consider driving me home from anywhere! Order extra mouth pieces, because all your friends and even strangers love to know if they are ok to drive at the end of party night. Get it, gift it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit-tested just fine!
customer_reviews.text: Tested against the other +$100 version and AlcoDroid app. Dead on! Works perfect. Read the directions and it will work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Have tried it multiple times and it sucks. My boyfriend waited an hour after drinking and blew into the BAC after having a double shot of 151 run and a double shot of Malibu. His BAC came back 0 all 3 times
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this. very accurate and good for knowing whether ...
customer_reviews.text: love this. very accurate and good for knowing whether or not that friend who says he's safe to drive actually is. not accurate if tested less than 20 minutes after your last drink, but that's every breathalyzer. handy to have it on my keychain too.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Aderer

customer_reviews.title: Fun but Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a present for my brother and it worked well for an entire day before it just totally broke & stopped functioning
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and then found out these things don’t work. Registered 0.0 after 2 glasses of wine. We tried it several times and got different readings even when testing 2 times in a row. Complete disappointment and when I went to return then they were “not eligible for return” for some unknown reason (had only been 2 weeks divide purchase). Also ... the fact that these aren’t accurate could be dangerous for people. Company should be ashamed but I’m sure they covered their butts legally. It’s the ethics they haven’t covered. Thanks for stealing my money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Maglia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use once you know how to use it.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice being able to know, numerically, how drunk you are. Once you get how to use the device it's simple. It is, though, really hard to explain to other drunk people, when you yourself are drunk, how to use the device if you want them to test their BAC / if they want to test their BAC. Works just fine though and was a worthy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My teen knows I have it and it works as a great deterrent to under age drinking
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be right on the money. My teen knows I have it and it works as a great deterrent to under age drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas1963

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Not very accurate. I have an interlock in my car and bought this to ensure I never blew in to it with any amount of alcohol on my breath. I had a couple occasions that I used this device and blew 0.0, several tries to be sure, but then failed my interlock (which is much more accurate). Unfortunately this caused me to get an extension on my interlock. Not recommended. Go ahead and spring for a higher quality product if you need accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: rachel landreth

customer_reviews.title: Great for personal use
customer_reviews.text: I use this when im out with friends and need to know if Im okay to drive. We use it alot as a party favor, as all my friends think its great. Thankfully it comes with mouth pieces that I can use to share, but the batteries die quickly so make sure you ahve spares in case you need them. Also if youre in a windy place, that messes with the reading so make sure you are away from any fans or ac units.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Perry

customer_reviews.title: To be honest it works ppl who say it doesn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: To be honest it works ppl who say it doesn’t it’s because you need to try it 2-3 times when it’s inaccurate meaning when I got 0.00% at times or just blow harder and it’s accurate no problem at all I use interlock breathalyzer so I have verified it worked perfectly by law in California
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a lawyer
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for managing you awareness . There are times i’ve used this device to reaffirm my intoxication level as well as others. Don’t argue with your friends and family . About their alcohol awareness. Just blow and you’ll know . If its low you can go. Invest in yourself . If you drink you need this. Never be in doubt about if you’re legal to drive . Cheaper than a lawyer and losing your license . This app also links to apple health . Watch you consumption . Collect data about you life .
customer_reviews.author: Christine Schobert

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer disfunction
customer_reviews.text: My first one was amazing but unfortunately got wet so I ordered a new one. The second was awful! Said I was blowing a .12 after 2 budlights. Then the second time I blew it came up .09. Yes, I waited 15 minutes after my last drink. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Have used it on several occasions and it's generally constant ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used it on several occasions and it's generally constant with reading as long as you follow the directions and wait a few minutes between tests.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to help keep my fiance honest about whether or not he's been drinking, we didn't really care how accurate I it was as long as it showed zero when he hadn't been drinking. We tested it as soon as we got it and it of course showed zeros because neither one of use had been drinking. We just tested for the first time today after I had a drink and it's still showing zero. Now we can't return it even though it's defective. I'll make sure to pay more attention to the return policy next time I buy something.
customer_reviews.author: Karisha

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these as gifts for my boyfriend and dad. One has been in use for about 4 months now, and works great! Gives accurate readings again and again - even after being stored in the car all winter. We keep it in there and use it whenever we've been drinking to decide who's safer to drive home (or if neither of us should). I left one star off because I am still skeptical of this product - the reviews were not so fabulous for long term use, so I'm kind of waiting for it to just crap out one day. For now, it's absolutely perfect and functional!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Entirely Broken Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: Has only displayed “FL” (fail) after every single blow. Does not work, don’t waste your money when there’s a 50% chance you’re going to get a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Kiaunis

customer_reviews.title: No Refund
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product and used it once. It seemed to work as I blew a zero and I wasn’t drinking, then again I expected that result. I got the device as I am in recovery and I wanted to assure my family Anyhow, it’s been sitting there unused for a couple of weeks and at $30 I wanted to return it. I tried and they have a no return policy. There is no mention of a no return policy on the sales page so I do find that really unfair. There should be something obvious showing return policy. Even if there is something, it shouldn’t be hidden in small print
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Barry

customer_reviews.title: Works great trust me I know.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second device I bought in 2 years. I still have my first one and works great still. I know these devices are supose to be calibrated but my old one works as accurate.. comes up with close if not dead on to the new one. I used it all the time. My old one even has a crack in the screen from stepping on it and it still works! I dont underestand some of the other negetive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: One of those things I didn't know I needed until I had it
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those things I've heard people talk about and figured it was kind of not worth the money but once I purchased it I didn't realize what I was missing out on. It isn't always the easiest to use or the most accurate, but for the price this has been awesome and I'm so happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate as other reviews claim
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading reviews about how the accuracy matched that of a pbt. However, I would not trust this to help me home safely. We played around with it at a party and sober people were blowing numbers higher than the clearly intoxicated guests.
customer_reviews.author: Madison T

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how long it will stay calibrated (manual says ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long it will stay calibrated (manual says 6 mo-1yr), but initial results seem fairly accurate. Don't really care if it's dead on. Live in a harsh dui state, and this helps ensure its ALL gone before driving.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap auto insurance, imho.
customer_reviews.text: Do not blow into it too hard, I use multiple readings before getting behind the wheel for safety's sake. It is a hoot at parties
customer_reviews.author: Daryl John meier

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: This item is super inaccurate, when it even wants to work. Half the time it beeps and you blow and nothing happens. When it finally does work, it gives you off the wall numbers. I tried it right out of the box and blew a 0.02. I hadn't eaten for at least an hour and hadn't consumed alcohol in days. Had one beer later in the evening and attempted to use it again. I waited 30 minutes after taking my last sip and blew a 0.2. I think not. I was so excited and had such high hopes for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a fun experiment. I wanted to use it for awhile before I gave an honest review. Thai thing never gives an accurate reading. You can blow 3 times in a row and get different reading... not small differences but significant ones. I don’t believe this would be good for people actually trying to judge their alcohol intake in regards to driving safely. Too many inaccurate readings. Two stars because it is easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Stormy M

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after about 2 months and I used it maybe 7 times at the most!!!! Do NOT BUY this product. A total waste of money. I checked it with several batteries. I feel like I've been cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Anne H. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Probably shouldn't rely on this
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I'd blow into it and it would register I had a few drinks, and 10 minutes later it would say I had zero.
customer_reviews.author: N. Strobel

customer_reviews.title: HOT!
customer_reviews.text: Put a battery in and the unit immediately overheated, way overheated. Pulled the battery out and burned my fingers. Let it cool down for a few hours and inserted another battery and the unit will not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Don L.

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be accurate. One point though...you must inhale deeply and then blow into the unit. It only works with air that has been exhaled from deep inside the lungs. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rivcuban

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for key chain
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size to keep on your key chain. It works very well. Only thing is the mouth pieces it comes with fall off easily if you keep them on the breathalyzer all the time. I don’t even use the mouth pieces but honestly they aren’t necessarily needed anyways
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mack

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate at all
customer_reviews.text: Not at all accurate. We had friends blowing very low numbers after a night of intense drinking when they were definitely schmammered and others blowing very high numbers after just one weak drink.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Item Arrived Defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister-in-law for her 21st birthday. She was excited to use it, but unfortunately the product will not turn on, even after changing the battery. We haven't gotten it to work yet, and it's non-returnable! A real disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Please just't don't buy this, I am sure you can find something accurate and worth it. It worked for a week and than never turn on Hahah . So please read the reviews and find something better
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Mini key chain brethalizer
customer_reviews.text: Product never worked have another larger backtrack product that works very well. This one not worth the packaging it was sent in.
customer_reviews.author: Diana w

customer_reviews.title: Defective and not eligible for refund or return
customer_reviews.text: Received and does not power on. Replaced the battery with a new one and still , no power. I asked for a return for defective item and it says not eligible for return! Extremely unhappy. Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and they work! Anyone that drinks should be required to own one.
customer_reviews.author: Jlang

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money - completely inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: Completely inaccurate. Do not buy! Wish I could return it. Total waste of money! I’ve had others of these that are consistent, this one is drastically all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew & Julie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We use this every time we drink just for fun.
customer_reviews.author: B-Dav

customer_reviews.title: Made my life safe
customer_reviews.text: Use this everytime I go out. Get one if you have a hard time not drinking and driving
customer_reviews.author: Brittana Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Works like it's suppose to!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Small and easy to use. Put on key chain or inside your purse. Always a great idea to see your bac before you even think about driving!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was defective
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to the "T" and each time my BAC percentage went down. It started at .05% after 15 minutes had passed since my last drink. After that I kept testing 15 minutes after every drink and it went down to .04% on so on. I would not recommend this product, or at this this specific product. Maybe their more expensive products work better?
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but the beeping noice is kinda annoying
customer_reviews.text: Can definitely track that you’ve consumed alcohol and like the connivence of the keychain. But I’m not a 100% sold on the accuracy since this is the cheapest model. Would like to test against some of the nicer quality breathalyzers they offer as well as a police grade one.
customer_reviews.author: Glprang

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for those who will use it.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these for friends to help them. It is easy and convient to opperate. And feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Milburn

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly like I was hoping, helps gauge if people should be driving after a night out or day at the lake!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, cracked before first use.
customer_reviews.text: Do not put this on your keys despite it having a keychain. Cracked before I could ever use it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: usually seems accurate?
customer_reviews.text: sometimes gives crazy readings very inconsistent but seemed accurate first month?
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Works Well + Fun Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought this for my 21st birthday in quarantine- fun to to play with (drink responsibly ofc) + seems like it'll last a while. Seemed pretty accurate for BAC counts, too
customer_reviews.author: Scarby Fam

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate junk
customer_reviews.text: inaccurate I have 3 of these all Bac I get a different reading on each of them. Not small differences big differences. The one if it goes into a long warm up and I've had nothing to drink I've gotten readings of .019 They are junk find new manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: steve pearson

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got a dud but mine is also only reading 0.00 no matter what. Tried it on 3 different occasions (evenings) and it never read anything. My friend whom has the black one, whom referred this one, had one that worked fine that same night...so I know their products work so it might have been a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: ronald h.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work, .02 with zero alcohol. Yet 0.0 after a glass of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas P. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: TRASH. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage product. Doesn’t turn on and tried 6 additional batteries in addition to the one it came with - tried to return and they say it’s not returnable. Literal garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Mon4866V

customer_reviews.title: Is not accurate after several months
customer_reviews.text: Would like to know if the item needs calibration ? Isn't accurate . Who can do this? I otherwise need to buy another BAC.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Crecelius

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price, no issues, has been accurate and used often, shipping was super fast, very pleased with BACtrack keyring!
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Very inaccurate readings. Would not recommend to anyone. Compared to 3 recently calibrated machines, this was VERY off.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Defective and non returnable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these and the first one didn't register anything and was totally defective. When I tried to return them , these things are non returnable. I will have to chalk this one up as " you get what you pay for". I would not trust these things to drive after drinking. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Dale Renner

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I was two days late to return this device but I saw other reviews and emailed the company and they sent a new one. I like how small it is and that it can fit on your key chain.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Lomax

customer_reviews.title: VERY ACCURATE!
customer_reviews.text: So I unfortunately was arrested for a DWI and was given a high tech breathalyzer I have to breathe into at certain hours... well, I wanted a little something to "test" myself before I do my official breathalyzer on the machine (not that I had been drinking or anything while on probation... haha) So i bought this. Very accurate, totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! My friends and I have had a chance to use this quite a few times now and I feel that it is more accurate than I anticipated.Get one!
customer_reviews.author: brad lorell flint

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a few weeks ago and it worked fine for a couple weeks about as accurate as you'd expect from a keychain BAC monitor. However, it just stopped working--I tried replacing battery and it still won't turn on I would recommend something else
customer_reviews.author: Ned Mylod

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Item
customer_reviews.text: No matter what battery I used it never turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kompkoff

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate at all. I stopped drinking hours ago, and I know I am way higher than what this says I am. It said I am at .09. I tried again 5 minutes later and it said I am at .000. Just tried again and it says I’m at .10. Tried one more time and I am again at. 000.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I am good, officer!
customer_reviews.text: cheaper than a DUI! so effective. And, I can't wait to tell an officer that I have checked myself, good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Pace

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: This breathalyzer is in no way accurate. I thought it would be good to verify I was okay to drive if I had a drink with dinner but the readings are all over, following all the mfg specific instructions. Save your money, do NOT buy
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Conversation piece at dinner parties and definitely makes you think ...
customer_reviews.text: Conversation piece at dinner parties and definitely makes you think twice before getting behind the wheel if it blows over the legal limit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: My breathalyzer said error from the very start and has never worked. It is not eligible for a return or an exchange either. Waste of money and poor customer service for not having an option for exchanging a faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: If you don't care sending for calibration and paying for that, you may like it
customer_reviews.text: It might be accurate. It is comfortable and easy to use. BUT it needs yearly calibration, which killed its use
customer_reviews.author: Yossef Gofer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great device if you don't intend to use it for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device if you don't intend to use it for judgment when a possible DUI is on the line. It has never given a ridiculously wrong reading, but again; it should be considered as a toy and not as an absolute.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: not that great
customer_reviews.text: not an accurate reading. If you need a Breathalyzer spend more money for a good one. Said I was above legal limit when I hadn't had alcohol in 48 hours, and I blew a sober after a night out?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Took 3 shots in an hour to see if this product would be a reliable resource for me. I waited 20 min from the last shot and it read 0.00 BAC. This is a waste of money. I would recommend spending a little more on a nicer model.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is never accurate u can drink water and it will read .14
customer_reviews.author: Glam_Jeweler

customer_reviews.title: Good device
customer_reviews.text: Works. I would definitely get multiple readings for a more accurate result
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It's pointless buying this. It produces a reading of zero unless you have just had a drink. After a short period of time, it doesn't pick up on the alcohol that is still in your body.
customer_reviews.author: SiBa

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Good indication overall. But sometimes need to take 3-4 tests to asses the most corrected reading. I'm happy overall
customer_reviews.author: Sajith c. kaluarachchi

customer_reviews.title: Only good if you're trying to fool somebody.
customer_reviews.text: I can be blasted off my rear and this thing will still read 0.00. It seems to only register over 0.01 immediately after a shot. Would not recommend if you are trying to accurately read your BAC after a heavy night of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Bob

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great until it doesn't. This thing just stopped working after a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Kat

customer_reviews.title: Handy little thing
customer_reviews.text: It does just what it says it will, if is very handy to have after a happy hour. Always turns into a contest it seems!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, always reads 0.02% or less
customer_reviews.text: I am a discount liquor Connoisseur and the product I received is defective. Even after consuming a large quantity of alcohol, it will read 0.02% or less (when the actual reading should be 0.08%+++).
customer_reviews.author: sc

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: My product does not work and it does not give me the option to request a new one. It literally does not turn on. I have put like 10 different new batteries in it. It does not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Briana leal

customer_reviews.title: Defective does not work
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!!! Item arrive defective turns on beeps and shuts down replaced with 4 new all different batteries still does the same thing beware no return policy as well waste of $35 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: sean r.

customer_reviews.title: Died two days after receiving
customer_reviews.text: I used this a total of 6 times, after which it completely died. Didn’t drop it either. It read error once, and then never turned back on. Don’t waste your money on this one
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Arbelaez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great. Gave to a few family members...and myself Keeps us safe as we enjoy wine tasting.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: I love taking it on the go so I can always ...
customer_reviews.text: It's tiny, portable, and works exactly as expected! I love taking it on the go so I can always be sure I'm within the legal driving limit!
customer_reviews.author: iluvmusic29

customer_reviews.title: Terribly inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: After having 3 drinks, I blew a 0.00. I've tried it multiple times on multiple different occasion's, this thing is absolutely not accurate at all, I would not Recommend any of my friends to buy this device.
customer_reviews.author: sari

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage. Seemed to work fine the first week or so and then would read a 0.00 even when I clearly had a few drinks. Complety unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Pradera

customer_reviews.title: spot on
customer_reviews.text: Works really great, we’ve done several different test on it in different situations and it seems to be spot on. And for the price, avoid going to jail and buy this!
customer_reviews.author: jace m.

customer_reviews.title: Not very accurate at all
customer_reviews.text: This breathalyzer is not very accurate at all. After having a few drinks it showed my bac to only be 0.00-0.01 even though I know I was well over that. Almost every time it shows my bac to be much lower than it actually is. A waste of money and definitely not a reliable source of your true bac.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Ripped packaging
customer_reviews.text: The box was ripped/damaged . It doesn’t affect the product, but looks crappy especially since I was giving it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Wulff

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very accurate, will say 2 very different numbers when you blow twice
customer_reviews.author: Allie Lynne Lohman

customer_reviews.title: Great breathalyzer!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Always works and seems very accurate. Definitely helpful to keep this in the car for nights out on the town.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A nice little gadget to have around to help give a ...
customer_reviews.text: A nice little gadget to have around to help give a general idea where your blood alcohol levels at. I wouldnt depend on it as accuracy could be off.
customer_reviews.author: tNguyeN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little breathalyzer. 5 stars, does exactly what it needs too and doesnt take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Baker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product and it does not work at all! Not at all accurate and there are no returns on it! Complete scam.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it on the drunks in my home all the time : ( Works well.
customer_reviews.author: BusyBee

customer_reviews.title: Bought a different brand and it worked a lot better.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't find this very accurate. Bought a different brand and it worked a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. McCallum

customer_reviews.title: 3/5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Honestly when i first got it it worked really good, but after a few parties it started to wear off
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy is way off!!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. It's either registering nothing or over the limit when it shouldn't be. Accuracy is way off.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K.

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product but do NOT purchase. Quit working a week after the return window closed so now I’m out $30... honestly disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BACtrack Go Keychain Breathalyzer, Portable Keyring Breath Alcohol Tester, White
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1| Color:WhiteThe BACtrack Go Keychain Breathalyzer is compact, convenient, and provides blood alcohol content (BAC) results in seconds. A fully functional breath alcohol tester, BACtrack Go is equipped with an Advanced Micro Check alcohol sensor that determines BAC quickly and accurately. To use, simply wait 15 minutes after your last drink, power on, and breathe into its innovative folding mouthpiece. Your results are displayed in seconds-it's that easy. Everyone will want to test themselves whether you're at a party, bar, restaurant, or anywhere else alcohol is consumed. Learn how drinking alcohol affects your BAC and drink more responsibly. Cheers to good decisions.Response Time -5 Seconds.
feature_bullets: Affordable with a take-anywhere small, sturdy design
Displays BAC results on an easy-to-read 3-digit LCD display
Folding mouthpiece maximizes portability and ease of use. Dimensions 1.45 x 0.55 x 2.44 inches (3.7 x 1.4 x 6.2 cm)
Designed in California and created by BACtrack, the #1 Most Trusted Brand of Breathalyzers in North America, with over 13 years of experience in the breathalyzer industry.
Stay informed of your BAC and make smarter, more informed decisions

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
